content.rendered:
It’s always hard to decide which smartphone you should buy next but it’s especially for those deciding their side in the Honor VS Huawei war. Both offer smartphones with very similar components but they also have differences that push them above each other. Specific perks such as prices, cameras, even fan bases can make one handset more appealing when you’re searching for a phone.

 

Perks of Honor devices

The biggest perk of choosing any of the Honor handsets is that they do tend to be cheaper than Huawei phones. This is purely down to the fact that they don’t have as much of a following as Huawei therefore, people are paying for the quality over the brand. Just by taking a closer look at any Honor device, you can see that they’re full of great parts and interesting features. You’ll also be able to get all this with a rather fun and unique design.

To put your mind at rest, Honor is actually an offcut of Huawei. These devices very closely follow Huawei releases with what they hold. Essentially, you’re paying for a cheaper Huawei handset! The processors, operating systems and batteries have all been previously seen in Huawei handsets.

 

The Best of Huawei

Most of Huawei’s fanbase will agree that one of the best features of any Huawei handset is the camera. If there’s one thing Huawei does better than anyone else, it’s make camera systems. Each Huawei camera has a collection of very strong lenses, backed by some great features. Huawei even has a trending hashtag on Twitter with everyone’s favourite photos from their Huawei’s.

As Huawei is a much bigger brand with a far larger following, you’ll be able to find accessories in more shops than Honor devices. This includes phone cases, screen protectors and even charging wires. This means you won’t have to settle for what you can find. You can be sure that there will be a range of different colours, patterns and textures. As Honor is a much smaller brand, you’re likely to have to settle with whatever you can find, which can be a big put off for other people.

 

Honor VS Huawei

There really is no clear winner of this fight of Honor VS Huawei, it’s entirely down to personal preferences. If you’re looking for something cheap and cheerful, Honor may just be for you! Anyone looking for something a little more high end may want to turn towards a Huawei handset.

One thing that devices have in common is that you will be able to find high end, mid tier and lower tier handsets available. These all get updated each year to ensure they’re able to keep their fan base up to date with the latest technology. Whilst Huawei have larger releases, you can still be sure to hear about the yearly releases from Honor too.

 

No matter which side you’re on in the Honor VS Huawei war, both will have the perfect addition for you. There are a whole range of different Honor and Huawei devices so you can find the one that best suits your needs.

excerpt.rendered: It’s always hard to decide which smartphone you should buy next but it’s especially for those deciding their side in the Honor VS Huawei war.
